channel.title: java on Random thoughts of a Developer
channel.description: Recent content in java on Random thoughts of a Developer

item.title: Java Performance Issues
item.description: Performance Issue - what and why There is nothing more daunting and interesting than issues related to performance. While we pay a lot of “undue attention” to performance in code reviews, “Don’t use a Linked List, use an Array List or use a Linked List not an Array List”, we often miss the bigger picture. Most performance issues don’t come from usage of type of list or types of for loops, they actually come from the most interesting and tricky parts of code.
